<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Dero Magister](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2904)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Dero magisters are leaders among dero society. They perform the bulk of the cruel operations and memory-altering procedures inflicted upon their victims.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 22

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 20

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 5">[Dero Magister](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2904)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=721" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Dero" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=749" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 85 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +8; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59)

**Languages**
[Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Sakvroth](/Languages.aspx?ID=118)

**Skills**
[Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +12, [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) +10, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +12, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +11

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +4

**Con** +2

**Int** +3

**Wis** -1

**Cha** +5
</row>

**Items**
[cytillesh toolkit](/Equipment.aspx?ID=59) (see sidebar), [Staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=12)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 22 

**Fort** +10 

**Ref** +13 

**Will** +10 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 65

</row>

**Immunities**
[confused](/Conditions.aspx?ID=63)

**Vulnerable to Sunlight** A dero magister takes 10 damage for every hour they're exposed to sunlight.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
staff +10 ([two-hand 1d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=198)),
**Damage** 1d4+3 bludgeoning

**Occult Innate Spells** DC 24
- **Cantrips (3rd)**
[Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246)
- **2nd**
[Darkness](/Spells.aspx?ID=59), [Revealing Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=1653)
- **4th**
[Nightmare](/Spells.aspx?ID=208), [Rewrite Memory](/Spells.aspx?ID=1655)

**Occult Spontaneous Spells** DC 24
- **Cantrips (3rd)**
[Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Forbidding Ward](/Spells.aspx?ID=126), [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=190), [Void Warp](/Spells.aspx?ID=1745)
- **1st**
[Force Barrage](/Spells.aspx?ID=1536), [Grim Tendrils](/Spells.aspx?ID=141), [Phantom Pain](/Spells.aspx?ID=220), [Soothe](/Spells.aspx?ID=291) (4 slots)
- **2nd**
[Laughing Fit](/Spells.aspx?ID=1583), [Paranoia](/Spells.aspx?ID=214), [Stupefy](/Spells.aspx?ID=1691), [Telekinetic Maneuver](/Spells.aspx?ID=333) (4 slots)
- **3rd**
[Blindness](/Spells.aspx?ID=26), [Levitate](/Spells.aspx?ID=170), [Vampiric Feast](/Spells.aspx?ID=1736) (3 slots)

**Cytillesh Stare** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [Visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163)) **Frequency** once per round; **Effect** The magister focuses their gaze on a creature they can see within 30 feet. The target is [dazzled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=65) for 1 round and must succeed at a DC 24 Will saving throw or be [confused](/Conditions.aspx?ID=63) for 1 round.

**Dero Medicine** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=89), [Manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) **Requirements** The dero is wearing a cytillesh toolkit and has a hand free; **Effect** The dero excises damaged flesh and crudely stitches wounds shut, healing themself or an ally in reach for 2d8+10 Hit Points. For 1 hour, the target has slashing weakness 2 and is immune to Dero Medicine.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-388" />
